prompts: Create a fiery Pokemon that resembles a creature made of flames and has a fierce expression.
I want a bipedal fire-type Pokemon with bright orange skin and a blazing tail.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that embodies heat and passion, with a glowing aura.
Make a cartoon-style Pokemon that showcases vibrant fire colors and dynamic poses.
Imagine a Pokemon that dances in flames, with a playful personality and energetic moves.
Design a fire-themed Pokemon with exaggerated facial features and a focus on warmth.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like it could be a fire-breathing creature from a fantasy world.
